name: Old Bow
description: The bow is past its prime, hopefully it won't break just yet.
tooltip: You gain 10% critical chance while wielding this weapon.
Shoot (70%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * DEX bonus piercing damage.
Barrage (25%): Deals 3-9 + 5 * DEX bonus piercing damage.
Perfect Shot (5%): Deals 1-6 + 5 * DEX bonus true damage. This attack has a +30% critical chance and pierces through anything.
